    Components




Sliders


    









    

        
Slider colors

        
For customize colors, add class blue, green, orange,
            grey or black beside the slider class.

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

    

    

        
Slider striped

        
If you want to have striped affect, add class stripped beside the slider class.

        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        


        
Slider striped animate

        
If you want to have striped animate affect, add class stripped-animate beside the slider class.


        

            

                

            

        

        

        

            

                

            

        

    

    

        
Slider sizes

        
For custom sizes, slider bar provides mini, medium, large, x-large sizes.
